pages.body:
# Welcome to ZeroNet !

[[ZeroWiki]] is a wiki platform for [[ZeroNet]], the distributed web network based on [[Bittorrent]], [[Bitcoin]] and [[Tor]]. 

[[ZeroWiki]] is public, [[cloning|clonable]]. Wikis can be used for taking notes, storing snippets, sharing knowledge by creating [[FAQ]]s and documentations, keeping track of your goals, or as a simple to-do lists. See the [[help|help page]] for a more in-depth view of how it works.

## Useful pages

- [[zeronet|What is ZeroNet ?]]
- [[zite|What is a "zite"?]]
- [[ZeroWiki:Format|ZeroWiki writing format]]
- [[List of Zites]]
- [[Dev ideas|Development ideas]]
- [[proxies|List of proxies, allowing you to view ZeroNet from clearnet]]
- [[zerowikisandbox|Sandbox, you can play with it before editing other pages]]

*Please note that [[ZeroWiki]] is still beta software, it may have bugs and lack some features
[[ZeroWiki:Issues|Propose features and report bugs here]].*

[[ZeroWiki]] is a wiki platform for [[ZeroNet]], the distributed web network based on [[Bittorrent]], [[Bitcon]] and [[Tall]]. 

[[ZeroWiki]] is public, [[cloning|clonable]]. Wikis can be used for taking notes, storing snippets, sharing knowledge by creating [[FAQ]]s and documentations, keeping track of your goals, or as a simple to-do lists. See the [[help|help page]] for a more in-depth view of how it works.

# Welcome to ZeroWiki!

[[ZeroWiki]] is a wiki platform for [[ZeroNet]], the distributed web network based on [[Bittorrent]], [[Bitcoin]] and [[Tor]]. 

[[ZeroWiki]] is public, [[cloning|clonable]] and editable. Wikis can be used for taking notes, storing snippets, sharing knowledge by creating [[FAQ]]s and documentations, keeping track of your goals, or as a simple to-do lists. See the [[help|help page]] for a more in-depth view of how it works.

## Useful pages

- [[zeronet|What is ZeroNet?]]
- [[zite|What is a "zite"?]]
- [[ZeroWiki:Format|ZeroWiki writing format]]
- [[List of Zites]]
- [[Dev ideas|Development ideas]]
- [[proxies|List of proxies, allowing you to view ZeroNet from clearnet]]
- [[zerowikisandbox|Sandbox, you can play with it before editing other pages]]

*Please note that [[ZeroWiki]] is still beta software, it may have bugs and lack some features. [[ZeroWiki:Issues|Propose features and report bugs here]].*  
*You defacers realize that there is a history button that lets you restore versions, right?*

# Welcome to ZeroWiki!

[[ZeroWiki]] is a wiki platform for [[ZeroNet]], the distributed web network based on [[Bittorrent]], [[Bitcoin]] and [[Tor]]. 

[[ZeroWiki]] is public, [[cloning|clonable]] and editable. Wikis can be used for taking notes, storing snippets, sharing knowledge by creating [[FAQ]]s and documentations, keeping track of your goals, or as a simple to-do lists. See the [[help|help page]] for a more in-depth view of how it works.

## Useful pages

- [[zeronet|What is ZeroNet?]]
- [[zite|What is a "zite"?]]
- [[ZeroWiki:Format|ZeroWiki writing format]]
- [[List of Zites]]
- [[Dev ideas|Development ideas]]
- [[proxies|List of proxies, allowing you to view ZeroNet from clearnet]]
- [[zerowikisandbox|Sandbox, you can play with it before editing other pages]]

*Please note that [[ZeroWiki]] is still beta software, it may have bugs and lack some features. [[ZeroWiki:Issues|Propose features and report bugs here]].*
*You defacers realize that there is a history button that lets you restore versions, right?*

# List of Game-oriented Zites 

- [A Random Zombie Survival Text Adventure](/1HjQ6RigqTp4wT3zbsXuLCXJMRPQRr3ei6/): Mud-style zombie survival game based on DayZ Chernarus map.

- [Candy Box 2](/13E8MVCj4uXanuWqXhvKaQ99MaDA5NNwp5/): AsciiArt RPG [Save feature does not work. So do not reload page while playing.]

- [Dyna Blaster ](/13N5YfLJu3mN4y3JnXuqj9ZJb2mnTzpRye/): Bomberman (1990 video game)

- [Flappy Bird](/1PANDAML8mLaRKPinGihTj5RkJV15awcjs/): version easy with a fly panda

- [Flappy Bird](/16nsEmQ1ErcdNRpe7zmSg5eF2Y1zQpuURp/): version original and hard to play

- [Hugo's House of Horrors](/1CpSYx9sBwxZKyzszBQQSq3uZhfNwZ4Ury/): classic 1990 parser-based graphic adventure game (similar to *Maniac Mansion*)

- [Game of Life](/19TrFbEUS1mdznSX24FqnxZgftzNpxCXv8): Conway's Game of Life (very simple edition)

- [maggiesDigger EIS-2.0](/1F8cFAxjLDXzHBnpJ8ZhgnVbCxE7zhATs4/): Digger and Alley Cat classic games from 1983

- [Pac man](/14Q1So3DH9qvHts5VuLDgqGp7yCXceujop/): pac man in original version

- [phi](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1EGGj9r2NsBue1ozfEoM3cUVuLqvABxJ5T/): [n game](http://www.thewayoftheninja.org/nv2.html) javascript equivalent

- [Prehistorik 2](/1BbFE1xH5S7ZM6itCb2PaN6iNPagW81ZbE): a simple platform game where the player walks and jumps his/her way through the levels and whacks enemies in the head with a club

- [Snake](/1JsJ1JitaLboc8pvo4fxh9dvP8mt6toPrE/): snake hard to play

- [SimCity](/13ozLST1c4rqUjCNLg1YFGWnYVVfPsVqnV): a city-building simulation game from 1989

- [Taxi Drift](/1EzPDDHciaG9AH4ErxsmAKsF4hsrJPktiM/): find customers and drive them to their destination

- [The Robbery](/14zQjCbU2BAy3uAUAXN5UJhq8YdAHyzUqK/the-robbery/index.html): Use the arrow keys to get as many coins as possible

- [TypinMaster](/1KNvxg3ww7ZLxZRPT8MX4tRcFxwGhWRRK3/): a touch typing game

- [Zarcade](/1EwpsssQGBrC2EZeYvxeQQoQbKNGivwDi4/): arcade games to play in the browser

- [ZeroSudoku](/16Gn4QBd8iXFnDcVEcsmYw8soBKCeBezzS): a HTML5 version of the well-known game of Sudoku

- [Solitaire](/ajsantos.bit/solitaire.html): a basic DHTML version of Solitaire

# List of Zites: Services | [[zite-list-services-talk|Talk]]

### Sites that provide some sort of utility to the visitor can be classified as a 'Service' site

**[Nullpaste](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1MgHVPCE1ve6QfKrgsqCURzRj72HrRWioz/).**  
Nullpaste is a version of Pastebin for [[ZeroNet]]. The zite offers both public and private publishing, syntax highlighting, and the ability to view recent pastes.  
  * Zite Address:   1MgHVPCE1ve6QfKrgsqCURzRj72HrRWioz  
  * Zite Discussion: [0List](http://127.0.0.1:43110/0list.bit/?Topic:1_16Szsy1UtjiXpEevWVdUDrNfNTAZ9PLbcY/NullPaste+Decentralized+pastebin+with+code+highlighting+encryption), ZeroCentral  
  * Zite Domain: 0pastebin.bit (unconfirmed)  

**[Authentication : ZeroID](http://127.0.0.1:43110/zeroid.bit/).**  
ZeroID is used as an authentication service for username ID's Obtaining a alias from this service will allow visitors to post comments on the various zites available on Zeronet.
  * Zite Address:   1iD5ZQJMNXu43w1qLB8sfdHVKppVMduGz  
  * Zite Discussion: 0List, ZeroCentral  
  * Zite Domain: zeroid.bit  

**[ZeroMail](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Mail.ZeroNetwork.bit/).**  
ZeroMail is ZeroNet's version of a mail client. ZeroMail allows visitors with a registered ZeroID username to send encrypted messages to other users who have a ZeroID username. The ZeroMail system can not be used to send email to external email addresses.  
  * Zite Address:  	1MaiL5gfBM1cyb4a8e3iiL8L5gXmoAJu27  
  * Zite Discussion: 0List, ZeroCentral, [ZeroTalk](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:10_1MxdAjWgnqwCaunGHmhY39tVR51qV3peJL/ZeroMail+support+thread)  
  * Zite Domain: Mail.ZeroNetwork.bit  

**[ZeroPolls](http://127.0.0.1:43110/ZeroPolls.bit/).**  
ZeroPolls is a polling platform that allows visitors with an assigned ZeroID to post and vote on polls. Results can be viewed after a vote is submitted and comments can be posted by clicking on the poll's title. **Be advised that there is a small chance that an attacker could discover your votes associated with your ZeroID with a bit of effort.**  
  * Zite Address:   1K28kQFMquNzto2iQf4GGjr6oFUbC1NddE  
  * Zite Discussion: 
[0List](http://127.0.0.1:43110/0list.bit/?Topic:1_1Mk5sVKeCrwMc3wSD11jM7DZTiqF5D9BaD/ZeroPolls), 
[ZeroCentral](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Dt7FR5aNLkqAjmosWh8cMWzJu633GYN6u/?Topic:4_1PvAyLAB5H1JKbiFjx95ZJXrNJVyWxs5Hf/ZeroPolls), ZeroTalk  
  * Zite Domain: ZeroPolls.bit  

**[ZeroProxies](http://127.0.0.1:43110/14y3fN1A214HYdKe5f6WnQdfT3PdKLSAJo/).**  
ZeroProxies is a site that contains a list of Zeronet proxy sites. These proxy sites allows visitors of the regular internet to be able to view a ZeroNet zite without installing or running the Zeronet client engine. Due to the portal being provided by a proxy, functionality can be limited.  
  * Zite Address:   14y3fN1A214HYdKe5f6WnQdfT3PdKLSAJo  
  * Zite Discussion: 
0List, 
ZeroCentral, 
[ZeroTalk](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:1_1ArMJqDaBJqeJ4MX3VqSnkfwkHe23PtLrW/Running+a+ZeroProxy)  
  * Zite Domain: 0proxy.bit, 0proxies.bit, zeroproxy.bit, zeroproxies.bit  

**[ZeroQuotes](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1NJyPoPpL8At17T6G7A1qHVQdqZDBmXcLT).**  
ZeroQuotes is a platform that features Quotes submitted by visitors. The site allows visitors to vote on the quotes that they enjoy.  
  * Zite Address:   1NJyPoPpL8At17T6G7A1qHVQdqZDBmXcLT  
  * Zite Discussion: 
[0List](http://127.0.0.1:43110/0list.bit/?Topic:81_1M5ztUWkCMP5Pv7MjwApWT7CNvWimGFaFa/ZeroQuotes), 
[ZeroCentral](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Dt7FR5aNLkqAjmosWh8cMWzJu633GYN6u/?Topic:81_1M5ztUWkCMP5Pv7MjwApWT7CNvWimGFaFa/ZeroQuotes), ZeroTalk  
  * Zite Domain: n/a  

**[ZeroTODOs](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1B8LmXYHzMGZzcRWoidAQb5SmKSyfjN63f).**  
ZeroTODO's is a platform that allows visitors to create tasks and checklists and organize activity in a planner style.  
  * Zite Address:   1B8LmXYHzMGZzcRWoidAQb5SmKSyfjN63f  
  * Zite Discussion: 
[0List](http://127.0.0.1:43110/0list.bit/?Topic:100_1M5ztUWkCMP5Pv7MjwApWT7CNvWimGFaFa/ZeroTodos), 
ZeroCentral, ZeroTalk  
  * Zite Domain: n/a  

**[Authentication : ZeroVerse](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1HPgDoReCFtE9qy71hnp55ksBVvV1gHJLQ).**  
ZeroVerse is an alternative platform to ZeroID, While operating in a similar way, the service will eventually be accepted in multiple places that accept ZeroID usernames.  
  * Zite Address:   1HPgDoReCFtE9qy71hnp55ksBVvV1gHJLQ  
  * Zite Discussion: 
0List, ZeroCentral, 
[ZeroTalk](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:4_1H8oKiRa7fGgUqS1hpUtaSYLvAqkaknbkf/yourID+ZeroVerse+bit+make+yourself+another+ZeroID)  
  * Zite Domain: zeroverse.bit  

**[QR Generator](http://127.0.0.1:43110/qrgen.bit/).**  
QR Generator creates QR codes instantly.   
  * Zite Address:   1NQhJp2DNAXwLUE6eFLVx7jnmBMEy3NJbo 
  * Zite Discussion: 
  * Zite Domain: qrgen.bit

**[IPFS crypto-addresses sharing](http://127.0.0.1:43110/17P4SJ1AsARbrj6naYbmAa7eSYCyr4UyJv/)**
  * Random
  * eLearning
  * Documentaries
  * Tutorials
  * Static HTML, eBooks
  * Applications ( GNU - Linux , Windows , MacOS , etc )
  * Movies, Series
  * Music
  * Sorted by years

**[zeroMaps](/1yUji4qPD7GAog8XkP3EDMEfrL995S4Xd/)**
   - Map of the Earth planet

**[git over ZeroNet](/1xxooZ7s8iDz3u56i5mNQ1XGmwF8Zvnw9/)**

# Dev Ideas

- Messaging app
- [proof of concept js application](/1AtRr9BPxKkPswG4uKn17bht2JCdv2cMqt/)
- "Facebook"-like in development 
- "CMS" admin panel for ZeroBlog

Games :
- Chess game

[[dev-resources]]

# List of Zites: Porn | [[zite-list-porn-talk|Talk]]

### Sites that provide porn.

* [0chan Porn](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1NZNtZQZHQRJXafvJpmY5jgqwRaCEZMsUc/) - Uses [[optional files]] to host images in these categories: Random, Hardcore, Gay, Lesbian, Hentai, Futanari, Fetish and Unpopular.

* [GIF Time/?RedditNsfwGifs](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Gif7PqWTzVWDQ42Mo7np3zXmGAo3DXc7h/?RedditNsfwGifs) - Non collaborative index of small and short sexual videos. Uses optional files.

* [Pix Image Albums/?TeenPix](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1KwcosRj1dR2rnZUQWYAaMseD74ps3o44m/?TeenPix) - Non collaborative index of non-nude images of young girls. Uses optional files.

* [Chicas 123](http://127.0.0.1:43110/14TPbCCnG4tzPYmJLJgXUbdxyPrR7ef8pU/) - Non optional files image index of women. Not collaborative.

* [Porn2Peer.bit](http://127.0.0.1:43110/porn2peer.bit/) - HQ WEBM videos. Uses [[optional files]].

* [PORN2PEER](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1AFUBsm13NrN7228bBe1UcqvcrCmYgUFLa) - for profit HQ porn provider.

* [怡红院](/1HNjT7PfBKpRgxq7b48z7iKchpYG4F5o5T/?Page:zite-list-porn)

* [javlib](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1FygwtRQHaiZ4R6da1QMMS1W8rk23tZaUh/) - for jap av infos

- [A Random Zombie Survival Text Adventure](/1HjQ6RigqTp4wT3zbsXuLCXJMRPQRr3ei6/): Mud-style zombie survival game based on DayZ Chernarus map.

- [Candy Box 2](/13E8MVCj4uXanuWqXhvKaQ99MaDA5NNwp5/): AsciiArt RPG [Save feature does not work. So do not reload page while playing.]

- [Dyna Blaster ](/13N5YfLJu3mN4y3JnXuqj9ZJb2mnTzpRye/): Bomberman (1990 video game)

- [Flappy Bird](/1PANDAML8mLaRKPinGihTj5RkJV15awcjs/): version easy with a fly panda

- [Flappy Bird](/16nsEmQ1ErcdNRpe7zmSg5eF2Y1zQpuURp/): version original and hard to play

- [Hugo's House of Horrors](/1CpSYx9sBwxZKyzszBQQSq3uZhfNwZ4Ury/): classic 1990 parser-based graphic adventure game (similar to *Maniac Mansion*)

- [Prehistorik 2](/1BbFE1xH5S7ZM6itCb2PaN6iNPagW81ZbE): a simple platform game where the player walks and jumps his/her way through the levels and whacks enemies in the head with a club

# List of Zites: Media | [[zite-list-media-talk|Talk]]

### Zites that provide media including movies, music, applications, books, can be considered media zites.

[peer-to-peer]: [[peer-to-peer]]

**[Microsoft MSDN Software Archive](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1AJB5rtjfB9imjDGVk5vtRtZp3zgYizbpG/).**  
This archive is a collection of MSDN Software taken from the Microsoft site, This zite uses Mega.nz links to provide content to visitors.  
  * Zite Address:   1AJB5rtjfB9imjDGVk5vtRtZp3zgYizbpG  
  * Zite Discussion: [0List](http://127.0.0.1:43110/0list.bit/?Topic:6_1BDapygZHNG8GxEuSsEpK9Xipm9mFfW1F2/isolinks+Official+Microsoft+MSDN+Software), ZeroCentral, ZeroTalk  
  * Zite Domain: n/a  

**[Play Torrents](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1PLAYgDQboKojowD3kwdb3CtWmWaokXvfp/).**  
Play Torrents is a zite that combines a beautiful user interface with move releases sourced from RARBG. The zite provides color coded ratings, movie trailers, and magnet links of various qualities. **Be aware that magnet links operate off of the [peer-to-peer] swarm and downloading media through this zite is just as easily monitored as The Pirate Bay**  
  * Zite Address:   1PLAYgDQboKojowD3kwdb3CtWmWaokXvfp  
  * Zite Discussion: 0List, ZeroCentral, ZeroTalk  
  * Zite Domain: playmovies.bit (unconfirmed)

**[Zero Torrents](http://127.0.0.1:43110/ZeroTorrent.bit/).**  
ZeroTorrent is a file-sharing zite that works off of the ZeroTalk platform. The zite allows any visitor with a ZeroID to publish links to magnet files, post comments, cast votes, and also provides categories and a search feature. **Be aware that magnet links operate off of the [peer-to-peer] swarm and downloading media through this zite is just as easily monitored as The Pirate Bay**  
  * Zite Address:   192dZ1EG5tU7PnCfuwGMDEBrr2eLqvs4t3  
  * Zite Discussion: [0List](http://127.0.0.1:43110/0list.bit/?Topic:44_1M5ztUWkCMP5Pv7MjwApWT7CNvWimGFaFa/ZeroTorrent), 
[ZeroCentral](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Dt7FR5aNLkqAjmosWh8cMWzJu633GYN6u/?Topic:3_1HcK5Hw1rPZeYdgTmqJGrVG2tSyR9Ke2Gt/ZeroTorrent), 
ZeroTalk  
  * Zite Domain: ZeroTorrent.bit

**[NullFolder : To download and upload the files via BitTorrent trackers](/1GrtBsG57kjU2Z3iAQebG9D5c8CRDRLoPj/files.html)**

**[Fastcast](/1GMsFaG1qro55py9HYsjCwAtt1tHbBRbwH)**
- Media player
- Media content sharing

**[Bwoi](http://127.0.0.1:43110/bwoi.bit/).**  
Bwoi is a music search engine built with a beautiful user interface. Bwoi was originally a search engine indexing zites, but has since been modified to show the capabilities of the Bwoi engine.  Users can upload tracks as well as listen to those uploaded by others.
  * Zite Address:   1f7FYxZWSZ5YG7Nd8sGsHcWEQgvdnVvQF  
  * Zite Discussion: 
0List,
ZeroCentral, 
ZeroTalk,  
  * Zite Domain: 
bwoi.bit  

**[NinjaBeats](http://127.0.0.1:43110/15F9LYs6c17NUXv3MxpJSGbpWxyHTEbzMk/).**  
NinjaBeats is a work-in-progress decentralised music streaming service with a well-defined dynamic user interface. Users can upload any kind of multimedia and share content uploaded by others in real-time using the NinjaBeats streamer.

On launch day (projected to be sometime in 2017), NinjaBeats plans on releasing its huge 300GB collection of lossless, "perfectly tagged" music accessible on the streamer, with a custom listing based on code from the Kaffiene search engine. The site currently displays info on the plans and progress of the project, and additionally discusses how it attempts to remain ethical and legal.
  * Zite Address:   15F9LYs6c17NUXv3MxpJSGbpWxyHTEbzMk
  * Zite Discussion: 
[0List](http://127.0.0.1:43110/0list.bit/?Topic:1_12EgeG4vgNHzuPJYZqVJQwy2W9vkywbQQu/NinjaBeats),
ZeroCentral, 
ZeroTalk,  [ZeroMe](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Profile/1RedkCkVaXuVXrqCMpoXQS29bwaqsuFdL/12EgeG4vgNHzuPJYZqVJQwy2W9vkywbQQu/paintninja@zeroid.bit)
